Manga logic
@SwordWizard word (in a good way)

She was lonely, resentfully, and her feelings where neglected. 

This isn't tragic. But it is somewhat sad. It's a bit obvious that in a small way she felt pain in refusing the kiss. And declaring this as more of an act of personal rebellion, and her taking something that her parents selfishly denied her. 

Had she had more faith of others and herself she would have left her concat information, video chat exists for a reason. 

In the end this is one of those cases where one can only be glad that it happened even if its over. 

Maybe fate will allow them to meet again. But alas that is too much to ask, isn't it?

But if there's not, It's gonna be depressing but It's still acceptable. I'm gonna be surprised if there's anyone who can fap to this after reading the story. cause I can't even get a boner while reading this, It's just straight up giving me depression. Overall, this story was a 10/10 even if it's not vanilla, the story itself is really good and the fact that it made the audience (us) sad/emotional makes this story successful. Herio did such a great job with the story and the art. Thank you Herio-sensei

As always, Herio delivers top of the market art. Although I'm not a fan of some of his posing and framing, both of them are perfect in this doujin (except maybe the creampie, although that's more on the taste side). Not much of a story, but still managed to give the feeling of loneliness the female lead must have been feeling and left the male lead with to the reader. I still think Herio's drawings still lack a certain lewdness to them, but he is certainly improving with each new publishing. Favorited.

Following your parents moving because of work is a big no-no. It's fine when it's their lifestyle, you may even learn to appreciate it, or perhaps they live on rented properties and decided to move to a house of their own (which sometimes requires moving to another city because of house market prices).

But if they do it for work, they earn enough grand to have a small apt rented for you, and if they don't want, they are selfish bastards who don't want to spend a dime of their wealthy to diminish the negative impacts of their life choices on others.
